jobs.title: Analista de Sistemas Pleno
Analista de SEO
Front End Engineer (ReactJS)
jobs.description:
Hello! Are you ready to Work from Home and transform your career?
We're looking for a Frontend Engineer to join the engineering team at Modus. Want to help our client's build awesome solutions to accomplish their goals and vision? Are you interested in working from home with some of the best talent on the planet? Then keep reading.
About You
You love building great software. Your work could be supporting new feature development, migrating existing features, and creating other mobile and web solutions for customers. You'll have a primary focus on frontend development using Javascript. You may be asked to jump into backend code from time to time. Our client's tech stack is JavaScript, primarily using ReactJS. A strong understanding of JS core (ES2019+) is required. We use modern tools, which means you'll have the opportunity to work with Webpack, Redux, Apollo, Styled Components, and much more.
You have worked with teams before on large and demonstrable projects. You're also familiar with frameworks like GraphQL, NodeJS, TypeScript, Jest, etc. You understand Agile software development, Unit testing, and DevOps practices, and can work closely with other teams to optimize your code. It would be nice that you had experience with back-end API.
You relish creating high quality code from the comfort of your own home. Your engineering projects will focus on understanding customers' needs and translating those needs from product specifications into functional, production ready code. You'll have the opportunity to ship code daily that will be used by customers.
You love learning. Engineering is an ever-evolving world. You enjoy playing with new tech and exploring areas that you might not have experience with yet. You are self-driven, self-learner willing to share knowledge and participate actively in your community.
Having overlap with your team is critical when working in a global remote team. Modus requires all team members to overlap with EST morning hours daily. In addition, reliable high speed internet is a must.
Things You Might Do
Modus is a fast-growing, and remote-first company, so you'll likely get experience on many different projects across the organization. That said, here are some things you'll probably do:
Give back to the community via open source and blog posts
Travel and meet great people- as part of our remote-first lifestyle, it's important that we come together as needed to work together, meet each other in person and have fun together. Please keep that in mind when you apply.
Teach and be taught: Modus creates active teams that work in internal and external projects together, giving opportunities to stay relevant with the latest technologies and learning from experts worldwide
Interact directly with internal and external clients to represent Modus and its values
Why Modus Create:
Our Benefits may vary according to the Country you are located in, so please reach out to our recruiter in case you have any questions.
If you become a contractor we offer:
Competitive compensation
100% Remote work (could vary according to the client's needs)
Travel according to client's needs
The chance to work side-by-side with thought leaders in emerging tech
Do you have what it takes? Apply today!
About Modus Create
Modus Create is a digital product agency that accelerates digital transformation. We use high performing small teams, emerging technology, and "new school" product development tools and methods to accelerate business outcomes. We support our clients across four core delivery areas: business and product strategy consulting, customer experience, cloud services, and Agile software delivery.
Driven by a team of world-class talent, we have been recognized by the Inc. 5000 list of fastest growing private companies 5 years in a row, the Washington Business Journal list of Fastest Growing Companies in the Washington, DC area two years in a row, and a top company for remote work by FlexJobs. We're also an official partner to Atlassian, AWS, Cloudflare, GitHub, InVision, Ionic Framework, and Vue.js!
Based on the model of an open source team, Modites work remotely, and are located across the globe. That's allowed us to hire the best talent in the world, no matter where they live. Our highly collaborative, autonomous, and effective working environment is fueled by a team unified by a love of continuous learning. Our years of thought leadership including books, whitepapers, blog posts, conference and MeetUp talks, demonstrate our commitment to sharing what we've learned.
We encourage every Modus employee to do the same. Our company is a platform for the growth of our employees. Through working with our distributed team of experts on challenging projects, every person that joins the Modus team can expect to continue growing and learning every day. This is your chance to be part of building something great.

jobs.title: Desenvolvedor(a) Front-end Pleno - WordPress
Magento 2 Developer
jobs.description:
Overview
Engine23 is a steadily growing startup, comprised of eCommerce experts who understand every last step of the customer journey. From code development to campaign deployment, our team knows what works for optimizing conversions.
Now we're looking for our next expert -- a remote Magento 2 Developer who is highly experienced in the front end and also proficient in the back end. Most importantly, we're looking for someone who can take this role and make it their own, bringing ideas and enthusiasm to the table, while truly commanding their position within the company.
You would be joining our mostly remote team, headquartered in New York. Our team is mostly remote because we aim to hire the best of the best... not just the "best nearby." If you have demonstrable success in PHP and Magento (and a resume we simply shouldn't miss) we encourage you to apply, no matter where you live.
Knowledge, Skills, Abilities, and Self Motivation to:
Develop full stack on the Magento 2 framework with clean, self documenting, and well documented code.
Architect, review, and communicate plans for solutions and quality assurance, along with reviewing implemented solutions for quality to provide feedback for improvement.
Debug and investigate code, server configurations, and integrations to identify, understand, communicate, and fix interference with desired functionality.
Setup, configure, optimize, maintain, synchronize, and document multistage local, vagrant, dev, stage, production running LAMP and LNMP in both hardware and virtual environments including load balancers.
Configure and optimize standard server components such as Redis, Memcache, SOLR, Varnish, Memcache, and New Relic; along with 3rd party custom software integrations.
Understand of OS level concepts such as SSL CSR generation and Certificate install; Configuring server SSL, ports, and firewall security for PCI compliance, email authentication through SPF and DKIM; Hardening system configurations; Bash scripting; Yum and Apt-get package managers.
Organize and track details to release software, server updates, and configuration changes through staged environment to production with consistent expected results.
Understand GIT at development and devop level to support team development environments, act as Merge Master, and clean up any issues that arise with repositories.
Develop and document internal server and software development processes, how-to’s, and troubleshoot references for both self and others.
Understanding of eCommerce concepts such as SSL types, PCI procedures, performance optimizations, SEO techniques, marketing integrations, email campaigns, delivery options and how they affect customers.
Ensure robust environments, backup solutions, monitoring solutions and ability to respond to uptime related issues.
Mastery of semantic HTML5, JavaScript (ES6), modern CSS, and CSS preprocessors.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX.
Preferred Education, Technical Skills, and Experience
Experience: 3+ yrs Development Experience, 2+ yrs Server Experience, 1+ year Magento 2 Experience.
Education Level: Bachelor's Degree, technical in nature.
Requires deep backend knowledge of at least one Modern PHP Framework or Platform such as Magento, Symfony, Laravel, Zend, or Yii.
Experience with the following required: PHP, Magento 2, Composer, LESS, jQuery, MySQL, Apache, Linux (CentOS preferred), and XML.
Experience with any of the following is a bonus: Magento 1, RequireJS, KnockoutJs, jQuery UI, ReactJS, VueJS, PHPUnit, and Grunt.
Attention to detail with exceptional organizational capabilities.
Ability to prioritize with good time management skills.
JIRA, Basecamp, and Google Docs experience.
Passion for learning and problem solving.
Provide examples of work and complete a coding challenge.
Job Type: Full-time
COVID-19 considerations:
This position is fully remote.
Work Remotely:
Yes

jobs.title: Desenvolvedor Front-End Pleno
Software Developer — Full-Stack JavaScript
jobs.description:
As a Software Developer at Myplanet, you'll work with high-profile enterprise clients on projects that impact thousands of people every day. Reporting to the Associate Director, Software Development, your role will feature plenty of technical challenges and opportunities to improve the practice and process of software development at Myplanet.
Responsibilities
Collaborate with other developers, designers, and team members creating and implementing project work
Prioritize and estimate work to be done alongside designers and Product Owner to ensure projects are delivered on time and on budget. Be transparent about progress.
Skills and Qualifications
Understand Computer Science fundamentals and Software Engineering principles
4+ years industry experience as a full-stack JavaScript developer, both front-end and back-end
Solid knowledge of modern web technologies and techniques such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and responsive design
Knowledge of the intricacies of working with different browsers (different vendors, versions, etc.) and mobile versus desktop
Experience with database technologies such as PostgreSQL and MongoDB is highly desired
Is the Role a Fit for You?
The Full-stack JavaScript Developer role emphasizes team collaboration, technical proficiency, and leadership in your area of expertise. You'll find fulfillment in the role if you:
Delight in making things. You thrill at the concept of going beyond the theoretical and applying your ideas, skills, and expertise to products used by people every day.
Find passion in new challenges. Every chance to learn and move things forward with your can-do attitude or to share your entrepreneurship excites you.
Thoroughly enjoy collaborative work. Knowledge sharing and the chance to be part of a team who co-own the output, instead of a solo hero who lives and dies by their work alone, is important to you.
Benefits and Perks
Explore ongoing opportunities for professional development: training, conferences, certifications, and in-house peer mentorship
Experiment with new techniques, wear multiple hats, and learn about new disciplines.
Pursue independent projects, explore new ideas, and challenge yourself in your field with 5 days of dedicated "Awesome time" (self-directed professional development) annually and quarterly training budgets
Enjoy a flexible schedule of full-time hours, health/dental benefits, and private US coverage
Our Toronto office is a modern, ergonomic space complete with standing/sitting desks and an open-concept social atmosphere
Additional perks are available including in-house mindfulness training, an employee stock option plan, remote group get-togethers, and more!
Performance and Growth Expectations
Our environment is not your average, hierarchical software studio: we emphasize accountability for outcomes, but autonomy in activities. Your work will be measured using our 360-degree system (a combination of peer and supervisor feedback) and will also be measured on the basis of client and user satisfaction. Your growth path is in your hands— you'll have ongoing meetings with a mentor and professional guide to help determine your path, but your progress will be based on what you hope to achieve and how you choose to access the resources available to you.
About Myplanet
We're a software studio with an integrated team of designers, developers, and product managers making smarter interfaces for the world's most influential companies. We believe that great software should do more on behalf of users, helping to empower employees and engage customers. Headquartered in Toronto, Canada with studio presence in Vancouver, Chicago, and San Jose, Costa Rica, we're a team of over 100 designers, developers, product managers and enablers hell-bent on making the workplace better.
Committed to an Inclusive Workplace
We are committed to fostering an inclusive and accessible environment as we build a workforce that reflects the diversity of the community in which we live, including those with disabilities. We are dedicated to providing accommodations in all parts of the hiring process in accordance with the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act and the Ontario Human Rights Code. If you require any accommodation, we will work with you to meet your needs.

jobs.title: Desenvolvedor(a) Front-end Vue.js Sênior (Gliesi)
jobs.description:
Esta é uma vaga de um cliente da GeekHunter, candidate-se para ter acesso as informações completas sobre a empresa.
Atividades
Desenvolvimento de sistemas e aplicações;
Manutenção de sistemas para correção de falhas/erros;
Implementação de melhorias;
Atuar como parte da equipe ágil;
Projetar, desenvolver, implantar e operar serviços na cultura DevOps;
Otimizar a aplicação para melhor velocidade e escalabilidade;
Criar código e bibliotecas reutilizáveis para uso futuro;
Colaborar com outros membros da equipe, engenheiro, product owner, scrum master e tech leader para resolver os desafios existentes.

Importante! Essa pessoa precisará apresentar em seus soft skills:
Pessoa com bom relacionamento interpessoal e que possa trabalhar em equipe;
Raciocínio lógico;
Flexibilidade e fácil adaptação;
Colaborativo e com facilidade para trabalhar em equipe;
Habilidades para lidar com pessoas diversas, ter muita empatia e ser resiliente.

Com DNA inovador e empreendedor, estamos preparados para o futuro da saúde.
Nossa área de inovação e células ágeis, o EXP, avança velozmente com a inteligência de dados aliada à expertise médica. Caminhamos para uma medicina mais personalizada e preditiva. Uma medicina que antecipa problemas e promove a qualidade de vida das pessoas. Como protagonistas desse setor, é o futuro que estamos construindo. Somos movidos pela paixão por inovar e transformar da saúde das pessoas.

Trazemos aos nossos pacientes o que há de mais avançado em Medicina Diagnóstica. Investimos continuamente em tecnologia, pesquisa e desenvolvimento, que são a chave para oferecermos um cuidado mais inteligente a saúde.

Valorizamos e queremos todos os tipos de pessoas aqui. Nosso ambiente é descontraído, com horários flexíveis e dias disponíveis para home office. No seu aniversário além das felicitações, você também ganhará um day off para curtir do jeito que quiser.

Além da colaboração dos colegas, você poderá mentorar e ser mentorado, apoiamos a disseminação de conhecimentos e estimulamos a realização de eventos em nossos auditórios.

Somo hoje mais de 40 squads no EXP, um pouco mais de 300 pessoas desenvolvendo produtos digitais e impactando milhares de vidas diariamente. Estamos divididos por jornadas, podendo atuar com foco no paciente, nos médicos, nos hospitais e também com soluções integradas ao ecossistema de saúde.

Neste desafio, buscamos uma pessoa para atuar como Desenvolvedor(a) Front End no nível entre Pleno e Sênior em nossa squad de Coleta Domicialiar. Estamos trazendo para o mercado de saúde um produto inovador e iremos mudar a forma dos pacientes se relacionarem com a medicina diagnóstica e sua saúde. Estamos trazendo mais comodidade e segurança para nossos pacientes ao realizar seus exames diagnósticos.

jobs.title: Application Developer-DevOps
jobs.description:
Introduction
As an Application Developer, you will lead IBM into the future by translating system requirements into the design and development of customized systems in an agile environment. The success of IBM is in your hands as you transform vital business needs into code and drive innovation. Your work will power IBM and its clients globally, collaborating and integrating code into enterprise systems. You will have access to the latest education, tools and technology, and a limitless career path with the world’s technology leader. Come to IBM and make a global impact!

Your Role and Responsibilities
Faz o acompanhamento consistente dos Fundamentos Lean Digital pelo pilar de Engenharia de Software.
Direciona e valida os padrões de desenvolvimento e integração entre as camadas de Micro Frontend, BFF e Microserviços.
Determina os frameworks necessários que serão utilizados pela Squad e implementa os principais mecanismos necessários, para garantia de segurança, performance e escalabilidade, de acordo com os modelo de arquitetura estabelecidos.
Aplica as soluções técnicas que permitirão maior agilidade no desenvolvimento do produto.



Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Full Stack Developer (Front-end and Back-end), with experience in integrating layers and platforms, experience with cloud architecture and concepts of DevSecOps, DataOps, Feature Toggle, Release Toggle and Canário.

***All positions are eligible for people with disabilities or rehabilitated.***

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
N/A

About Business Unit
IBM Services is a team of business, strategy and technology consultants that design, build, and run foundational systems and services that is the backbone of the world's economy. IBM Services partners with the world's leading companies in over 170 countries to build smarter businesses by reimagining and reinventing through technology, with its outcome-focused methodologies, industry-leading portfolio and world class research and operations expertise leading to results-driven innovation and enduring excellence.

Your Life @ IBM
What matters to you when you’re looking for your next career challenge?

Maybe you want to get involved in work that really changes the world? What about somewhere with incredible and diverse career and development opportunities – where you can truly discover your passion? Are you looking for a culture of openness, collaboration and trust – where everyone has a voice? What about all of these? If so, then IBM could be your next career challenge. Join us, not to do something better, but to attempt things you never thought possible.

Impact. Inclusion. Infinite Experiences. Do your best work ever.

About IBM
IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that progress is made through progressive thinking, progressive leadership, progressive policy and progressive action. IBMers believe that the application of intelligence, reason and science can improve business, society and the human condition. Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are the largest technology and consulting employer in the world, with more than 380,000 IBMers serving clients in 170 countries.

Location Statement
For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBM
IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

jobs.title: Desenvolvedor Magento / SR

Analista Data Science
jobs.description:
Nossa equipe de TI opera como um parceiro de negócios, propondo idéias e soluções inovadoras que permitem novos recursos organizacionais. Colaboramos internacionalmente para fornecer os serviços e soluções que ajudam todos a serem mais produtivos e possibilitar a inovação.
Estamos procurando um profissional com sólida experiência na manipulação de conjuntos de dados e na construção de modelos estatísticos, com formação e/ou pós-graduação em estatística, matemática, ciência da computação ou outro campo quantitativo e familiarizado com os seguintes softwares / ferramentas:
Responsabilidades:
Colaborar a desenvolver a área de Data Science na equipe e em projetos na América Latina;
Capacidade de transformar dados em conhecimento para dar suporte ao desenvolvimento de ações de vendas;
Desenvolver soluções e modelos preditivos e gerar insights para a equipe de negócio sobre o mercado agro e de saúde animal
Participar, conforme necessário, de reuniões com clientes internos para ajudar a explicar a metodologia e as soluções propostas baseado em análise de dados.
Requisitos:
Superior completo em: Ciência da Computação, Matemática, Estatistica ou Engenharia da Computação
Conhecimento e experiência em codificação em várias linguagens: C, C ++, Java, JavaScript, python, R, ETL, etc.
Conhecimento e experiência em técnicas estatísticas e de mineração de dados: GLM/Regression, Predictive Models, Random Forest, Boosting, Trees, text mining, social network analysis, etc
Experiência na criação e uso de algoritmos e estatísticas avançados de aprendizado de máquina: regression, simulation, scenario analysis, modeling, clustering, decision trees, neural networks, etc
Experiência na consulta de bancos de dados e no uso de linguagens estatísticas: R, Python, SLQ etc.
Experiência no desenvolvimento e teste de modelos teóricos, de aprendizado de máquina e modelos estatísticos;
Perfil analítico e data-driven;
Inglês intermediário
Desejáveis
Experiência em ferramentas de front-end para visualização e dados usando: Spotfire, Business Objects, Tableau, MS Power BI, etc.
Experiência no uso de webservices: Redshift, S3, AWS, Spark, etc.
Experiência na análise de dados de fontes terceiras: Google Analytics, Site Catalyst, Coremetrics, Adwords, Crimson Hexagon, Facebook Insights, etc.
Experiência com ferramentas de computação / dados distribuídos: Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Gurobi, MySQL, etc
Our Support Functions deliver services and makes recommendations about ways to enhance our workplace and the experience of working at our organization. Our Support Functions include HR, Finance, Information Technology, Legal, Procurement, Administration, Facilities and Security.
Who we are …
Merck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, New Jersey, USA is known as “Merck” in the United States, Canada & Puerto Rico. We are known as “MSD” in Europe, Middle East, Africa, Latin America & Asia Pacific. We are a global biopharmaceutical leader with a diverse portfolio of prescription medicines, oncology, vaccines and animal health products.
We are driven by our purpose to develop and deliver innovative products that save and improve lives. With 69,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, we offer state of the art laboratories, plants and offices that are designed to Inspire our employees as we learn, develop and grow in our careers. We are proud of our 125 years of service to humanity and continue to be one of the world’s biggest investors in Research & Development.
What we look for …
In a world of rapid innovation, we seek brave Inventors who want to make an Impact in all aspects of our business, enabling breakthroughs that will affect generations to come. We encourage you to bring your disruptive thinking, collaborative spirit and diverse perspective to our organization. Together we will continue Inventing For Life, Impacting Lives while Inspiring Your Career Growth.
INVENT.
IMPACT.

jobs.title: CRM Analyst
jobs.description:
Accenture is a global company made of people passionate about the new. Curious, determined people who are not afraid to take risks and propose non-standard solutions. We are the leading company in professional services, with extensive operations in strategy and consulting, interactivity, technology and operations, supported by digital capabilities in all services. We deliver relevant solutions that directly impact different markets and the lives of thousands of people. We work together with the largest companies in the world and with cutting-edge tools, taking advantage of what is most current in the digital market.
We develop experiences that revolutionize people's lives. We work with customers and partners to design, build and execute platforms that deliver meaningful solutions serving purposes and innovation, delivering applications and helping to build architectures that will define the future of business.
If you like challenges, digital and analytical marketing, multichannel, development (front end, back end), media management, digital architecture and infrastructure, passionate trends, agile and intelligent processes and an exciting work environment, your place is here!
This opportunity is part of Accenture Interactive, an award-winning team recognized by Ad Age as the largest digital network in the world for five consecutive years. Reinvent the customer experience, create, deliver and stand out in new and digital ways through connected products in design, marketing, content and commerce.
One day is different from the other. We are more than 509 thousand people, present in more than 120 countries, committed to doing what is new every day and making the world a better place for people.
Our main value is Respect for the Individual. We make no distinction of gender, color, sexual orientation, social position or disabilities. Everyone has equal opportunities to build their careers in an inclusive and diverse company.
If you are also passionate about what you do, come and meet the challenge that Accenture is offering you!
What will you do in your day to day?
You will be responsible for managing strategy projects and implementing customer relationship actions on digital channels like e-mail, sms, push, custom audience, social notification, chrome / android notification, on-site banners…
Among the activities of the position, the main ones:
Workflow management;
Project management related to e-CRM, database mapping and integration, customer analytics, campaign strategy and implementation;
Interface with client (presentation of rules, planning, reports);
Optimization of production methods;
Strategic planning;
Implementation of the proposed actions on platforms for sending campaigns;
Analysis and reports;
Creation of filters / segmentations
Monitoring and optimization of the entire conversion funnel

What we are looking for in the person who will be part of the team:
Bachelor’s degree (indifferent area)
Intermediate knowledge in excel (Hlookup, Vlookup, Pivot Table, If, etc.)
Intermediate knowledge in Google Analytics
Knowledge (necessary to know how to program campaigns and rules) on multichannel platforms - Salesforce Marketing Cloud (priority), Allin and Oracle Responsys
Experience in planning and implementing campaigns and multichannel relationship rules.
Experience in project management
Intermediary English
Besides… what else can you have?
Knowledge in Excel (Macros / Developer)
Knowledge in Oracle Responsys
Knowledge in Adobe Campaign (Standard)
Knowledge in SAS Customer Intelligence 360
Knowledge in AWS SAP Hybris Marketing
GA certification (GAIQ)
SalesForce Marketing Cloud Certification - Email Specialist (or plus)
Advanced English;
We know that there are some technologies that you may not yet know or have no experience with, but don't see it as an impediment to applying for the job, ok? We want Accenture to be a place where you can learn daily and that we can evolve together. Can we count on its potential to work with us in digital transformation within our customers? Apply!

jobs.description:
O que esperamos de um Front-end?
Aqui, o Front-end precisa ser curioso e gostar de interagir com pessoas, principalmente com clientes internos e o próprio time. Somos responsáveis por definir melhores práticas de desenvolvimento de front-end, escolha de frameworks e linguagens de script, identificar riscos, trabalhar junto com o time na discussão das histórias até definirmos a solução de negócio e técnica, trabalhar junto com o UX na construção da melhor experiência para nosso usuário.... em resumo, precisa ser dinâmico, não ficar sentado na cadeira e fazer as coisas acontecerem. Precisa ser decisivo e incisivo nas discuções sempre dando seu pitaco no que acredita ser o melhor caminho ou a melhor solução.

Identificar e atuar nos impactos do projeto e/ou histórias que afetem o time, o produto ou a organização;

HTML, CSS, experiencia com compiladores de estilo (Sass ou Less), consumo de APIs, manipulação de JSON, ter atuado em projetos ágeis, auto-organização é fundamental, JavaScript, versionamento de códigos .git, vivência em metodologias ágeis como kanban e scrum.

jobs.title: Senior Node Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Já imaginou trabalhar em um ambiente colaborativo, horizontal e diverso, de verdade, onde as pessoas trabalham com confiança e respeito umas nas outras e tem uma vida equilibrada, com muitos desafios e aprendizado?

Gostou? E tudo isso tem um propósito maior que todos nós: Transformar a Educação Pública do Brasil.

A Nova Escola

A Nova Escola existe há mais de 30 anos trabalhando com muita paixão e propósito. Nossos produtos fortalecem os educadores e gestores escolares em sua missão de desenvolver o potencial máximo dos seus alunos.
Hoje temos 3 milhões de visitantes únicos por mês em média em nossa plataforma, grandes parceiros como a Google e a Omidyar, sendo uma das ventures do grupo Lemman.
Estamos em plena transformação digital da empresa, com alto investimento em tecnologia, produtos e experiência do usuário. E por isso, estamos expandindo nosso time de desenvolvimento.

Nosso Time de Desenvolvimento
O time de desenvolvimento vivencia os desafios de construir os produtos da Nova Escola, atuando desde a escolha das tecnologias, desenho da arquitetura até o desenvolvimento das soluções. A cada dia somos desafiados a trazer soluções ainda mais simples e efetivas para o negócio.
Nosso dia-a-dia é pautado por resolução de problemas complexos, com espaço para questionar e propor novas ideias. E tudo isso fica mais fácil com squads com autonomia para tomar decisões sobre os produtos.

Responsabilidades e atribuições
Desenvolver micro serviços em Node.js utilizando Typescript e MySql.
Utilizar testes unitários visando alto índice de cobertura do código.
Desenvolver código seguindo padrões e utilizando boas práticas de desenvolvimento. Nada de Code Smells.
Alinhar expectativas e entregas de valor.
Construir novas funcionalidades para produtos web/mobile.
Otimizar aplicações existentes trazendo velocidade e escalabilidade.
Propor funcionalidades favoreçam o desempenho e usabilidade dos produtos Nova Escola.
Propor melhorias, correções e refatorações.
Analisar e propor melhorias no código de outras pessoas do time.
Buscar e compartilhar conhecimento com membros da equipe.

Requisitos e qualificações
Vasta experiência programando em Node
Conhecimento em banco de dados MySQL
Experiência em Typescript, REST API, TDD, GIT, micro serviços
Conhecimento em Linux

DIFERENCIAL
Conhecimento em Docker
Conhecimento em Front- End (HTML/ CSS/ JavaScript)
Conhecimento em AWS

Informações adicionais
O que oferecemos
Contratação CLT com flexibilidade de horário
Participação nos Resultados da Empresa (até 2 salários nominais)
Plano de Saúde Amil (apartamento) 90% para funcionários + 50% para dependentes
Licença estendida de maternidade e paternidade
Vale Refeição - Sodexo
Auxílio creche (até 7 anos)
Aulas de Inglês (na empresa)
Recesso de fim de ano (10 dias de folga)
Devido a pandemia do COVID-19, atualmente estamos trabalhando em modelo de home office. Esperamos em breve voltar para nosso escritório, no bairro de Pinheiros, em São Paulo, quando tudo estiver seguro para esta volta. Nosso escritório se encontra em uma região de fácil acesso (metrô e ônibus) e também com várias opções de restaurantes, lazer e esporte.
Faça parte do time que está transformando a Educação pública do país!

#ouseetransforme

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES
Desenvolver um Front-end para nosso e-commerce começando do zero utilizando bibliotecas e frameworks atuais de mercado consumindo uma API consolidada.
Construir essa aplicação nos moldes de um PWA, garantindo uma experiência simples e agradável para o usuário.
Aplicar técnicas de SSR (server-side render) a fim de otimizar SEO e resultados de busca.
Utilizar uma estrutura arquitetural que garante a reutilização dos componentes dentre outros aplicativos que podem ser criados, trazendo uma visualização no estilo Storybook.
Garantir uma experiência responsiva, permitindo o cliente utilizar a ferramenta em qualquer plataforma.
Resiliência e alta disponibilidade da aplicação.
REQUIREMENTS AND SKILLS
4+ anos de experiência relevante trabalhando como desenvolvedor de software
Curiosidade e conhecimento sobre tecnologias e padrões de arquitetura de engenharia de software em toda a stack com foco em tecnologias front-end (CSS, Javascript, html5 entre outros)
Profundo conhecimento em React, estilização de componentes (styled-components, styled-system) e criação de tema.
Integração com API Rest e GraphQL.

O que seria ótimo se você tiver?
React-native
Conhecimento básico em plataformas de back-end (Nodejs, php).
Experiência com Azure e Google Cloud Platform.
Monorepo com lerna.
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Antes de mostrar nossos benefícios, deixa eu já te contar uma coisa: aqui as coisas acontecem em um ritmo acima da média.

A rotina em uma empresa de tecnologia é alucinante e o aprendizado é contínuo e diário. O melhor disso é que temos autonomia para colocar esse aprendizado em prática e buscar resultados.

E se errarmos? Voltamos e consertamos rápido, até criarmos aquilo que acreditamos ser parte da transformação de nossos clientes.

Isso tudo acelera o nosso crescimento e nos torna a maior empresa de tecnologia do Brasil, ditando o ritmo do mercado nos mais diversos setores, fazendo tecnologia que transforma.

Dito isso, oferecemos:

Universidade em Rede TOTVS, uma universidade Corporativa com conteúdos e certificações gratuitos para os nossos TOTVERS;
Programa +Saudáveis, que cuidamos dos nossos TOTVERS com assessoria e ações voltadas para o bem estar em corpo, mente e finanças pessoais;
Programa +Vantagens, a maior rede de descontos da América Latina, exclusivos para nossos TOTVERS;
Plano de saúde e odontológico;

Espaço de lactário;

Auxílio creche;
Previdência privada;
Escritório que estimula a criatividade e produtividade com ambientes para lanches, salas de jogos, mesas de bilhar e poltronas para relaxar;
Gympass;

Nós valorizamos a diversidade e inclusão, consideramos todos os candidatos para as nossas vagas, independente de cor, raça, religião, gênero e identidade de gênero, nacionalidade, deficiência, orientação sexual, ascendência, idade, etc.
OUSE E TRANSFORME MAIS DE 40 MIL CLIENTES NA MAIOR EMPRESA DE TECNOLOGIA DO BRASIL
Aqui na TOTVS a ousadia e a transformação fazem parte da nossa rotina.

Somos a maior empresa de tecnologia do Brasil e nosso poder de transformação faz com que nossos softwares estejam presentes em mais de 40mil empresas no Brasil e no mundo.
O nosso grande segredo para estar sempre um passo a frente do mercado é a ousadia e a transformação que nossos TOTVERS promovem todos os dias.

Ousadia para movimentar 25% do PIB brasileiro por meio dos clientes que usam os nossos softwares.
Ousadia para ser a primeira empresa de tecnologia do Brasil a ser listada na Ibovespa.
Ousadia para fazer da mudança a nossa rotina, com mais de 40 aquisições ao longo de nossa história.

Nossa curiosidade nos impulsiona e, o melhor, todo mundo colabora com todo mundo, não importa quem deu a ideia: todos estão dispostos a ajudar e se envolvem legitimamente para fazer dar certo e entregar resultados.

Tudo isso acontece em um ambiente leve e divertido, mas já deixamos claro: a intensidade e a rapidez com que as coisas acontecem aqui é acima da média.

jobs.title: Desenvolvedor(a) Senior Front-end React
jobs.description:
Esta é uma vaga de um cliente da GeekHunter, candidate-se para ter acesso as informações completas sobre a empresa.
You will be writing code 70% of your time. We have several products to create, software to expand and only so many hands, so expect to get yours dirty soon and often.

20% of your time will be dedicated to keeping (and raising) the technical bar inside Origin. You will do code reviews, take part in architecture discussions, recommend books & articles to your colleagues (and read their recommendations), interview candidates and raise engineering problems before those happen.

The rest of your time will (unfortunately) be taken by meetings. You will join us for our daily standups, weekly all-hands, and sprint plannings, plus an individual one on one (a16z.com/2012/08/30/one-on-one) with our Head of Technology every other week.

Origin’s culture is unlike most startups (and next-to-all big companies) in Brazil. We give, receive and act on feedback all the time, holding no grudges and keeping no filter (brandonb.cc/no-filter-the-meanest-thing-paul-graham-said-to-a-startup) – all of us are aligned around the same mission and have the same objectives. We value work-life balance, so we do not track hours and have an open vacation policy. We know knowledge workers like yourself need to rest and take breaks (twitter.com/naval/status/873624849230385152), so we expect your time in the office to be time working so your time away can belong entirely to you. We keep a quiet environment and avoid interrupting each other. We usually have lunch together and do game-nights semi-regularly. We go straight to the point and talk about problems when we see it.
Remember when we said you should work here so you could write great code? Now you know why: we have no other option. We are building multiple consumer-facing products in a regulated fault-intolerant industry. This hasn’t been accomplished before for a reason, and we will succeed only if we create flexible, reliable and reusable software that allows us to move fast without breaking anything.

So, while you don’t need to know the technologies we are currently using (React, Typescript) beforehand, you need to be a great engineer who also is:

Relentlessly resourceful (paulgraham.com/relres.html);
Intellectually rigorous;
Technically excellent (facebook.com/notes/kent-beck/mastering-programming/1184427814923414);
A good English speaker; and,
Willing to live in the biggest city of the Southern Hemisphere, São Paulo.
Habilidades Obrigatórias
React
TypeScript
Habilidades Desejáveis
A vaga aceita trabalho remoto?
Não

jobs.title: Desenvolvedor PHP / Magento
Analista de Desenvolvimento de Software Sênior (Front End)
Software Engineering Specialist Front-End - Remoto
jobs.description:
Sabemos que tecnologia será o "drive" de crescimento desta virada e estamos dispostos a investir pesado e com prioridade. Passamos por um Follow On recentemente e além de tech, nossos investimentos foram destinados para Logística e Reforço de Caixa. Nosso time não parou de crescer, mesmo durante a pandemia, pois nosso propósito é entregar sonhos para os nossos clientes todos os dias, para isso melhoramos, aprendemos e nos desenvolvemos, sempre em uma direção clara. Topa esse desafio? Você poderá atuar na nossa Matriz em São Caetano do Sul/SP ou trabalho remoto.

Sua contribuição para algo maior é:

Estamos buscando líderes técnicos Front-Ends que ficarão com a missão de entregar e garantir a Visão Técnica da equipe, alinhada com a estratégia do produto com o objetivo de grandes resultados para nossos clientes.
Nossas equipes multifuncionais são apaixonadas por colaboração e compartilhamento de conhecimento, além de trabalharem com um alto grau de autonomia.
Como líder técnico da Via Varejo, você terá a oportunidade de desempenhar um papel fundamental na proteção de altos padrões técnicos e na definição de uma agenda técnica clara em sua equipe. Você também terá um impacto significativo no crescimento dos indivíduos dessa equipe.

Responsabilidades e atribuições
Além disso te desafiamos em:

Gerenciar a estratégia técnica de evolução do domínio e suas dependências técnicas visando minimizar o débito técnico.
Você defenderá o compartilhamento de conhecimento, cultivará o aprendizado e evitará silos de conhecimento na equipe;
Demonstre práticas de engenharia modernas saudáveis, escrevendo código limpo, bem testado e bem refatorado com a equipe, enviando-o para produção pelo menos diariamente.
Demonstrar comportamentos que incentivam a cultura DevSecOps e a atitude pragmática da engenharia de software;
Liderar iniciativas para melhorar nossa cultura de engenharia em toda a empresa e descobrir maneiras de multiplicar a eficácia da equipe e da organização
Envolver-se no recrutamento de novos engenheiros e iniciativas para fortalecer a marca da nossa equipe de engenharia

Requisitos e qualificações
Com certeza você tem que ter:
Experiência significativa em engenharia de software em mais de uma linguagem de programação, como:

Domínio de HTML5 | CSS3 | LESS ou SASS
ReactJS
Redux
ECMAScript 6
Experiência com NodeJS Server, exemplo:
Express
HapiJS
Webpack/Gulp
Unit Test (Jest/Mocka)
Experimente arquitetar e desenvolver sistemas complexos em um ambiente baseado em nuvem
Conhecimento de práticas modernas de engenharia, como código limpo, TDD, refatoração
Conhecimento em microsserviços, usando uma variedade de linguagens de programação.
Vivência com criação de APIs RESTful;
Experiência na construção de aplicativos com princípios de programação funcional e padrões orientados a objetos;
Experiência na criação de aplicativos de baixa latência e altamente resilientes usando princípios de programação reativa;
Conhecimento em criação de painéis intuitivos para monitoramento;
Experiência na realização de testes de carga / estresse do sistema
Possuir bons conhecimentos em algoritmos e estruturas de dados;
Já tenha trabalhado num ambiente baseados em princípios ágeis com metologias como (Scrum, Kanban, Lean);
Esteja familiarizado com mensagens assíncronas (com Kafka, RabbitMQ ou similar);
Tenha conhecimentos em bancos de dados SQL e NoSQL;
Competências linguísticas: proficiência profissional completa em inglês
Um amor pelo aprendizado e o amor por ajudar os outros a aprender e crescer
Paixão por construir um ambiente diversificado e inclusivo
Um senso de independência e uma capacidade de estabelecer estruturas ou processos para se adaptar a um domínio e ambiente em constante evolução
Paixão por tecnologia com colaboração muito próxima com partes interessadas técnicas e não técnicas

Informações adicionais
E os benefícios? Vamos te contar, alguns deles:

Assistência médica e odontológica
PLR / bônus
Licenças maternidade e paternidade estendidas
Desconto em produtos
Dresscode: seja você!
E muito mais :D

O que pensamos sobre diversidade?

Nós consideramos que as diferentes perspectivas ampliam o olhar e promovem a criação de um ambiente plural, mais rico e desenvolvido culturalmente. Tratamos a todos indistintamente e não toleramos preconceito e discriminação em qualquer relação com o nosso público, sejam clientes, fornecedores, prestadores ou colaboradores.
#VEMPRAVIA

Para isto, precisamos de uma pessoa focada, com capacitade entrega, disciplinada e que se compromete a entregar o projeto no prazo acordado.

Você ficará responsável por:

Conhecimento das boas práticas de SEO para implementar corretamente as necessidades da área de SEO.

jobs.title: Analistas e Consultores - Data Engineer
jobs.description:
A Accenture é uma empresa global composta por pessoas apaixonadas pelo novo. De gente curiosa, determinada, que não tem medo de arriscar e propor soluções fora dos padrões. Somos a empresa líder em serviços profissionais, com ampla atuação em estratégia e consultoria, interatividade, tecnologia e operações, sustentada por capacidades digitais em todos os serviços. Entregamos soluções relevantes que impactam diretamente diversos mercados e a vida de milhares de pessoas. Atuamos em conjunto com as maiores empresas do cenário mundial e com ferramentas de ponta, aproveitando o que existe de mais atual no mercado digital.
Desenvolvemos experiências que revolucionam a vida das pessoas. Trabalhamos com clientes e parceiros para desenhar, construir e executar plataformas que entregam soluções significativas atendendo propósitos e inovação, entregando aplicações e ajudando a construir arquiteturas que definirão o futuro dos negócios.
Se você gosta de desafios, marketing digital, marketing analítico, multicanais, desenvolvimento (front end, back end), gestão de mídia, arquitetura e infraestrutura digitais, tendências apaixonantes, processos mais ágeis e inteligentes e um ambiente de trabalho instigante, seu lugar é aqui!
Esta oportunidade faz parte da Accenture Interactive, uma equipe premiada e reconhecida pela Ad Age como a maior rede digital do mundo por cinco anos consecutivos. Reinvente a experiência do cliente, crie, entregue e se destaque de formas novas e digitais por meio de produtos conectados em design, marketing, conteúdo e comércio.
Um dia é diferente do outro. Somos mais de 509 mil pessoas, presentes em mais de 120 países, engajados em fazer o novo todos os dias e transformar o mundo em um lugar melhor para as pessoas.
Nosso principal valor é o Respeito pelo Indivíduo. Não fazemos distinção de gênero, cor, orientação sexual, posição social ou deficiências. Todos têm oportunidades iguais de construir sua carreira em uma empresa inclusiva e diversificada.
Se você também é apaixonado pelo que faz, venha conhecer o desafio que a Accenture está te oferecendo!
O que você vai fazer no seu dia a dia:
Analisar os dados ao longo de seu ciclo de vida, buscando seu melhor entendimento e validando junto aos data owners.
Especificar padrões necessários para os dados, e apontar remediação necessária em casos de não adequação.
Observância proativa de dados e criação de alarmísticas que previnam utilização de dados inadequados.
Gerenciar a resolução de problemas de qualidade de dados em toda estrutura de Bancos à Dashboards
Validação da ingestão de novos dados, garantindo acurácia e adequação à padrões estabelecidos.

O que estamos procurando na pessoa que vai fazer parte do time:
Experiência com algumas ferramentas/tecnologias
SQL;
Python;
Linguagem de programação de dados (R, SAS, etc)
Manipulação de bases de dados relacionais;
Noções de tecnologia de Big Data (eg: Spark, Hive, Impala e Apache Beam);
Ter atuado em pelo menos um ambiente cloud (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, etc);
Ter atuando em com ferramentas de visualização de dados (Tableau, QlikView, PowerBI, etc)
Além disso… o que mais você pode ter?
Experiência em mais de um ambiente Cloud e em mais de uma ferramenta de visualização de dados
Experiência com Google BigQuery, Apache Airflow, Docker e/ou Kubernetes.
Conhecimento de bases de dados não relacionais e/ou colunares como: MongoDB e Google Big Table

Sabemos que existem algumas tecnologias que talvez você ainda não conheça ou não tenha vivência, porém não veja isto como um impedimento para se candidatar na vaga, está bem? Queremos que a Accenture seja um lugar onde você possa aprender diariamente e que possamos evoluir juntos. Podemos contar com seu potencial para trabalhar conosco na transformação digital dentro de nossos clientes? Candidate-se.
“A Accenture não discrimina por motivos de raça, religião, cor, sexo, idade, deficiência não incapacitante para a função, nacionalidade, orientação sexual, identidade ou expressão de gênero, ou por nenhum outro motivo proibido pela legislação local. Essa oportunidade é extensiva a todas as pessoas com deficiência. Solicitamos que seja descrito no currículo o tipo de deficiência, bem como se requer algum recurso especial para desenvolver seu trabalho”.

jobs.title: Desenvolvedor(a) Full Stack (ênfase em back-end)
jobs.description:
Descrição da empresa
A Pricefy é uma das maiores retailtechs (startups de varejo) do país. Atendemos mais de 4.000 lojas de diversos segmentos com uma inovadora solução de comunicação inteligente de preços. Dentre os principais clientes, destacam-se: GPA, Carrefour, Leroy Merlin e Via Varejo.
Atividades e Responsabilidades
Desenvolvedor de software experiente com pelo menos 10 anos de experiência em web e integração de sistemas, tendo atuado principalmente em programação de back-ends, porém com “experiência real” em front-end;
- Consegue arquitetar, implementar de ponta-a-ponta e colocar em produção um sistema distribuído com microsserviços, bancos de dados, filas, caches e o que mais o problema pedir. Você sabe o que está fazendo e o porquê está fazendo;
Está acostumado a debugar sistemas em produção. Por isso, você escreve log;
Gosta de ir além do escopo da tarefa que está em mãos e aprender mais sobre o negócio que o produto de software se propõe a atender. Será que a solução proposta é a mais adequada? Você é alguém que fica feliz em desvendar esta e outras perguntas;
Considera sempre o tempo de desenvolvimento de um requisito em função do time-to-market esperado e do custo de manutenção e evolução do entregável final;
Sente-se confortável discutindo requisitos de interface com especialistas de UX, funcionais com especialistas de negócio e arquiteturais com demais programadores do time;
Cultiva o hábito de estudar técnicas de programação, linguagens, bibliotecas, frameworks e padrões arquiteturais com regularidade. Aliás, qual foi o último livro que você leu?
Encara desafios técnicos como oportunidade de aprimoramento de suas habilidades e sente-se motivado com isso. Não importa se front-end ou back-end, você está sempre disposto a resolver um problema com software e aprender algo novo com isso;
É capaz de trabalhar remoto, organizado com suas tarefas e comprometido com o time. Por isso, você procurar sempre escrever código limpo, seguir padrões e boas práticas de engenharia de software e não deixar para trás ovinhos de crocodilo para pegar os colegas.
Requisitos
Ferramentas que você com certeza domina:
Git
Docker
JavaScript / TypeScript
REST API em Node.js
AWS Lambda com Node.js
Redis, Elasticsearch, Postgres e SQL Server
Uso de serviços em cloud AWS / GCP / Azure
Você não domina, mas tem bastante familiaridade com:
C# / .NET Core
Load Balancer, Reverse Proxy e API Gateway
HTML e CSS
Angular 2+ / React JS
Material Design / Bootstrap
Seria um diferencial bacana se você soubesse algo de:
Golang
Terraform
AWS ECS
Android / iOS / PWA
AWS Amplify / Google Firebase
O que nós oferecemos
Local de trabalho e horário flexíveis
2 semanas de descanso remunerado
No Dress Code - Seja você mesmo!
Investimentos em treinamentos e eventos

Sobre a Avanade:
A Avanade é a consultoria líder em soluções inovadoras de digital e nuvem, soluções de negócios e experiências que levam design aos nossos clientes, entregues por meio do poder das nossas pessoas e do ecossistema Microsoft. Fazemos tudo aquilo que você espera de uma empresa líder em inovação digital, mas é o que você não espera o que nos torna diferente. Somos 36.000 pessoas conectadas em 24 países, construindo histórias e fazendo acontecer.
Sabemos que o trabalho não é sua única paixão e colocamos nosso valor em você - sua carreira, seus objetivos e seu desenvolvimento para que você possa ser a sua melhor versão.

Aqui, somos comprometidos com um ambiente inclusivo e diversificado, onde as nossas pessoas podem fazer seu melhor trabalho. jobs.title: Analista de Segurança da Informação Pleno (DevSec)
ANALISTA DE UX
Ux/designer
Desenvolvedor(a) Full Stack Web
Desenvolvedor Front-End - São Paulo/SP Pleno
Desenvolvedor(a) Full Stack
Intern Data Engineer (m/f/d)
jobs.description:
Who we are
Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we’re enjoying skyrocketing growth.
Our broad range of data-driven solutions in data consulting and digital marketing are designed to meet our clients’ specific needs, always conceived with a business-centric approach and delivered with tangible results. Our data-driven services are built upon the deep AI expertise we’ve acquired with our 1000+ client base around the globe.
We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation. Thanks to a unique mix of company assets: State of the art data technologies, lean AI agile methodologies for fast delivery, and cohesive teams of the finest business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, data engineers, and digital experts, all dedicated to bringing extra value to every client.

Your responsibilities :
Innovate. You will work with your team which is made up of consultants, data scientists, creatives and engineers to identify your clients needs and define innovative solutions.
Build. You’ll take ownership of the solution from start to end. You manage both conception and implementation, whilst also optimising the performance and scalability.
Train. You will work in a collaborative team which champions knowledge sharing. You will coach others, keep abreast of industry news/updates and get stuck into training sessions with our business partners and suppliers, such as Google & Amazon.
Communication. You will regularly attend events and conferences to share your knowledge, learnings and success, with the capability of presenting and communicating
Your mindset
Curious, you are always seeking innovative solutions for your clients. You are involved in all the value chain which can be, front-end, back-end, big data infrastructure, ML model …
Sharing of knowledge is essential for you and you actively participate in the diffusion of information within Artefact (seminaries, formations, certifications)
Entrepreneurial, you bring solutions, new ideas, within your team at Artefact
Profile :
You act on all the value chain of projects (infrastructures and platforms creation, data collection, application of machine learning models, APIs REST creations, of front-ends, of tests, continuous deployments)
You have a good knowledge of python (Java and Scala are an asset), you know how to navigate *nix thank to CLI, you are familiar or have already used cloud technologies such as GCP or AWS, you have already used bug data technologies like Flink, Spark, or Beam and Docker (K8S is an asset)
You can popularize technical terms or solutions to more business oriented profiles, you can work in a team with very diversified profiles
You know how to prioritize your tasks, respect deadlines, prevent in case of problems
You have a good level of English
Why join us :
Innovative projects and technologies, exciting
Really competent team, co-progression guaranteed
Strong ambition for the data department, full of progression opportunities (technical, management)
Recent Stack : Python, Spark, React/Redux, Google Cloud Platform (BQ, Dataflow, Compute Engine…), Nifi, HDFS, Ansible, Docker, Redis, …
Come join us !

A Pricefy é uma das maiores retailtechs (startups de varejo) do país. Atendemos mais de 4.000 lojas de diversos segmentos com uma inovadora solução de comunicação inteligente de preços. Dentre os principais clientes, destacam-se: GPA, Carrefour, Leroy Merlin e Via Varejo. Somos membros do Cubo Itaú, TOP10 Marketing do ranking 100 Open Startups, Apoiadores do RetailTechClub.com e RetailLab ESPM, destaques do RetailTech Mining Report e Inovativa Brasil, e membros do portfólio da ACE, considerada a melhor aceleradora de startups da América Latina.
Estamos em busca de um desenvolvedor de software “pleno” para integrar uma de nossas squads, que trabalha em uma linha de produtos web e mobile com ampla base de usuários.
Procuramos por alguém que queira estar focado no client-side das aplicações, mas que se sinta confortável em se aventurar no server-side quando necessário; e tenha certeza que será.

Quem é você:
Desenvolvedor de software com pelo menos 5 anos de experiência em web, tendo atuado principalmente em programação de front-ends, porém com “experiência real” em back-end;
Gosta de ir além do escopo da tarefa que está em mãos e aprender mais sobre o negócio que o produto de software se propõe a atender. Será que a solução proposta é a mais adequada? Você é alguém que fica feliz em desvendar esta e outras perguntas;

Sente-se confortável discutindo requisitos de interface com especialistas de UX e contratos de API com especialistas de back-end;

Encara desafios técnicos como oportunidade de aprimoramento de suas habilidades e sente-se motivado com isso. Não importa se front-end ou back-end, você está sempre disposto a resolver um problema com software e aprender algo novo com isso;

jobs.title: Specialist Back-end Developer - Tech Delivery Hub - São Paulo
jobs.description:
QUALIFICATIONS
Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent area preferred
5+ years of experience in software development
Domain of Java or C#
Extensive knowledge of Object Oriented Programming and experience with frameworks as Spring and Spring Boot, .Net Core
Significant experience writing and using Restful API services and large-scale apps for performance improvement
Knowledge of web services and complex software systems
Ability to create unit tests and effective integration
Experience with relational and non-relational database systems
Ability to work with multiple teams to provide technical guidance and oversight



WHO YOU'LL WORK WITH
You will work in our Sao Paulo office and be part of the Tech Delivery Hub team. You will be a part of a tribe committed to solving problems for people using technology.
You’ll join a global team working on everything from IT modernization and strategy to agile, cloud, cybersecurity, and digital transformation. You’ll typically work on projects across all industries and functions and will be fully integrated with the rest of our global firm.
You’ll also work with colleagues from across McKinsey & Company to help our clients deliver breakthrough products, experiences, and businesses, both on technology and non-technology topics.
Our office culture is casual, with an emphasis on education and innovation. We have the freedom to try new ideas, experiment and are expected to be constantly learning and growing. There is also a strong emphasis on mentoring others in the group, enabling them to grow and learn.
WHAT YOU'LL DO
You will make custom software tools that will be implemented directly within our client organizations.
In this role you’ll be a part of fast-moving implementing applications at various scales. You will also help design our front-end together with a team, you will make them come alive.
You will help us design our stack and make it successful. You will also help bring Agile development methodologies, ensuring that the software projects we create continue to grow. You will exercise your creativity and technical skills

jobs.title: Front End Engineer (WordPress, PHP)
jobs.description:
Hello! Are you ready to Work from Home and transform your career?
We're looking for a WordPress/PHP Engineer to join the Modus Marketing team. Are you a knowledgeable engineer who excels at building beautiful, performant websites? In this role, you will work with the Marketing and Business Development teams to help Modus Create tell its unique story through our web channels - attracting, educating, and capturing prospects.
About You
You are a versatile engineer with experience working with PHP, WordPress, and associated plugins. With your extensive knowledge, you've helped Marketing departments and businesses tell their story; including increasing discoverability through SEO, building high performing and engagement pages and modules for web apps, aiding tracking and conversion with optimizations, tracking bots, and tagging.
You bring 2-4 yrs experience in CSS/XHTML/JavaScript/PHP/WordPress, an understanding of visual editors such as Beaver Builder and Gutenberg, a good understanding of Web services, REST and RPC APIs, and a proficiency with code versioning tools, such as Git. Having built Gutenberg components with React is a plus. Additionally, you'll be expected to possess knowledge of SEO principles, Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager. Having experience working on Marketing websites a plus, as is an understanding of Agile methodologies.
You're deeply committed to learning about and engaging existing and prospective customers. As the champion of Modus' voice in the market, you are counted on to be proactive in bringing to the table ideas for our website. Much like the products we build for our clients, we want the Modus website to be a beautiful, intuitive, and highly performant experience.
You love learning and bringing new thinking to your job. Modus is full of lifetime learners, so you'll fit right in. And, our industry and marketing approach are ever-evolving; therefore, being innovative about how we present our content and messaging on our website is key. You enjoy exploring and testing new ideas & platforms and are motivated to find key insights that unlock new ideas.
You will be responsible for building, maintaining, and updating Modus Create web properties in CSS/XHTML/JavaScript/PHP/WordPress. In order to do that, you'll be expected to produce high quality production ready code in an agile environment; improving usability, architecture, and adding new features to our consumer-facing web presence. You'll also help the team with A/B testing and optimization to improve conversion and engagement.
You will be responsible for identifying and executing a backlog of remediation and improvement steps, proactively identifying refinements to Modus' web channels. Collaborating with others in the Marketing department, the Engineer will work with the Design team to build and display assets that align with the Modus brand style guide. To provide real-time analytics and assist the Marketing team with customer intelligence, lead generation, and retargeting, you will be expected to Integrate HubSpot, Google, and social media tracking code.
Things You Might Do
Modus is a fast-growing, and remote-first company, so you'll likely get experience on many different projects across the organization. That said, here are some things you'll probably do:
Give back to the community via open source and blog posts
Travel and meet great people- as part of our remote-first lifestyle, it's important that we come together as needed to work together, meet each other in person and have fun together. Please keep that in mind when you apply.
Teach and be taught: Modus creates active teams that work in internal and external projects together, giving opportunities to stay relevant with the latest technologies and learning from experts worldwide
Interact directly with internal and external clients to represent Modus and its values
Why Modus Create:
Our Benefits may vary according to the Country you are located in, so please reach out to our recruiter in case you have any questions.
If you become a contractor we offer:
Competitive compensation
100% Remote work (could vary according to the client's needs)
Travel according to client's needs
The chance to work side-by-side with thought leaders in emerging tech
Do you have what it takes? Apply today!
About Modus Create
Modus Create is a digital product agency that accelerates digital transformation. We use high performing small teams, emerging technology, and "new school" product development tools and methods to accelerate business outcomes. We support our clients across four core delivery areas: business and product strategy consulting, customer experience, cloud services, and Agile software delivery.
Driven by a team of world-class talent, we have been recognized by the Inc. 5000 list of fastest growing private companies 5 years in a row, the Washington Business Journal list of Fastest Growing Companies in the Washington, DC area two years in a row, and a top company for remote work by FlexJobs. We're also an official partner to Atlassian, AWS, Cloudflare, GitHub, InVision, Ionic Framework, and Vue.js!
Based on the model of an open source team, Modites work remotely, and are located across the globe. That's allowed us to hire the best talent in the world, no matter where they live. Our highly collaborative, autonomous, and effective working environment is fueled by a team unified by a love of continuous learning. Our years of thought leadership including books, whitepapers, blog posts, conference and MeetUp talks, demonstrate our commitment to sharing what we've learned.
We encourage every Modus employee to do the same. Our company is a platform for the growth of our employees. Through working with our distributed team of experts on challenging projects, every person that joins the Modus team can expect to continue growing and learning every day. This is your chance to be part of building something great.

jobs.title: Engenheiro de Qualidade Software Sênior
jobs.description:
O PagSeguro foi criado para oferecer soluções inovadoras, simples e seguras em meios de pagamento. Trabalhando conosco, você tem a oportunidade de fazer a diferença na vida de milhões de brasileiros e construir novas formas de se fazer e receber pagamentos.
Trabalhamos em times multidisciplinares e cultivamos uma filosofia de trabalho ágil e enxuta, com as áreas de Tecnologia e de Negócios trabalhando lado a lado para criar produtos que evoluam de forma iterativa para entregar valor aos clientes.

Responsabilidades e atribuições
Planejar estratégias, abordagens, ferramentas, tipos de testes e suas aplicações nos projetos e para as entregas.
Colaborar com os times e com outros QAs para a construção de uma estratégia de testes efetiva e eficiente.
Participar de todo o processo de desenvolvimento, fazendo e participando de alinhamentos e discussões, colaborando desde a construção das histórias até a entrega e monitoração em produção.
Contribuir com a construção das histórias, alertando o time sobre os riscos no desenvolvimento e na integração de sistemas, ajudando a elucidar critérios de aceite e cenários de teste que ajudem o time a ter clareza do que deve ser feito.
Fazer troubleshooting em QA e em produção (Logs, Splunk, e New Relic), para facilitar o entendimento e direcionamento mais eficiente dos problemas.

Requisitos e qualificações
Superior em Tecnologia da Informação ou áreas correlatas.
Experiência com linguagem de programação Java, Kotlin, Python, JavaScript e Ruby, para desenvolvimento de testes automatizados e investigação de problemas.
Experiência com banco de dados Oracle, MySQL e NoSQL (Cassandra, MongoDB, DynamoDB e FireStore), para realizar consultas e criação/manipulação de massa de dados.
Experiência com controle de versão GitHub e Bitbucket.
Experiência em testes de API (aplicações back-end): REST-assured, Karate e Postman.
Experiência em testes de UI (tela/front-end): Selenium WebDriver e Cypress.
Experiência em testes mobile: Appium e/ou nativas (Expresso e XCUITest) e BrowserStack.

Desejável
Experiência com integração e delivery contínuo: Jenkins ou outra ferramenta de CI.
Conhecimento de mensageria: RabbitMQ, SQS e Kafka.
Experiência com as plataformas de serviços: Apache Mesos, AWS (ECS e Lambda), Google Cloud Platform e Kubernetes.
Experiência com testes BDD: Cucumber.
Ferramentas de Log e Monitoração: Splunk, Kibana, New Relic, Firebase (Mobile), AWS CloudWatch.

Informações adicionais
Local de Trabalho: Faria Lima (próximo à Linha Amarela do Metrô)

jobs.title: Coordenador Desenvolvimento Digital
Desenvolvedor(a) Full Stack
Global Technical Recruiter
jobs.description:
Experience level: Senior
Hello! Are you ready to Work from Home and transform your career?
We're looking for a senior Global Technical Recruiter to join the talent acquisition team at Modus. Want to help our client's build awesome solutions to accomplish their goals and vision by bringing in new talent? Are you interested in working from home with some of the best talent on the planet? Then keep reading.
About You
The Global Technical Recruiter will play a critical role by managing the whole recruiting cycle. This role will be interacting with potential candidates coming from social media and professional networks (e.g. LinkedIn, Slack and Github, etc.) crafting action plans for effective sourcing, and utilizing our ATS (Greenhouse.io) to communicate with current and potential candidates. In addition, you bring the seniority and experience to coordinate with technical hiring managers to determine position requirements. This role will be reporting directly to the Global Talent Acquisition Manager and will work in partnership with global technical recruiters, consultants, Principals, Directors, HR, Operations and Executives.
Your main responsibility will be using various channels to attract, retain and convert into hires our potential candidates, manage offers and contact active candidates to build talent pipelines for current and future hiring needs. You have solid networking skills, know how to source on open technical communities and enjoy learning about different tech stacks. You bring heavy technically focused recruitment experience and have 6+ years of proven technical sourcing for mobile, web, and software development organizations, attracting various roles including Full Stack, Front and Back End Engineers, Devops, QA and Data Science profiles.
You have a thorough understanding and hands-on experience with sourcing techniques including recruiting on social or communities platforms and crafting Boolean search strings. Strong usability with Talent Acquisition databases, hands on experience using Greenhouse and it's CRM tool as an Applicant Tracking System (ATSs), Candidate Management Systems (CMSs) is critical; in addition, SaaS products and agile processes knowledge is desirable. This role will source candidates applying around the globe, so having a strong network would be advantageous.

You love to communicate with past applicants regarding new job opportunities, and you are passionate about measuring conversion rates, including numbers of passive candidates who turn into applicants, get interviewed, offered and hired.
You use Trello, Jira or similar products for tracking work and you are highly independent requiring minimal supervision and direction. You have solid verbal and written communication skills (B2-C1 english level), plus the ability to positively present our company and open roles to potential candidates. You effectively manage your time and you bring a BSc in Human Resources Management or relevant field.
Having overlap with your team is critical when working in a global remote team. Modus requires all team members to overlap with CST & EST morning hours daily. In addition, reliable high speed internet is a must.
Things You Might Do
Modus is a fast-growing, and remote-first company, so you'll likely get experience on many different projects across the organization. That said, here are some things you'll probably do:
Give back to the community via open source and blog posts
Teach and be taught: Modus creates active teams that work in internal and external projects together, giving opportunities to stay relevant with the latest technologies and learning from experts worldwide
Interact directly with internal and external clients to represent Modus and its values
Why Modus Create:
Our Benefits may vary according to the Country you are located in, so please reach out to our recruiter in case you have any questions.
If you become a contractor we offer:
Competitive compensation
100% Remote work (could vary according to the client's needs)
Travel according to client's needs
The chance to work side-by-side with thought leaders in emerging tech
Do you have what it takes? Apply today!
About Modus Create
Modus Create is a digital product agency that accelerates digital transformation. We use high performing small teams, emerging technology, and "new school" product development tools and methods to accelerate business outcomes. We support our clients across four core delivery areas: business and product strategy consulting, customer experience, cloud services, and Agile software delivery.
Driven by a team of world-class talent, we have been recognized by the Inc. 5000 list of fastest growing private companies 5 years in a row, the Washington Business Journal list of Fastest Growing Companies in the Washington, DC area two years in a row, and a top company for remote work by FlexJobs. We're also an official partner to Atlassian, AWS, Cloudflare, GitHub, InVision, Ionic Framework, and Vue.js!
Based on the model of an open source team, Modites work remotely, and are located across the globe. That's allowed us to hire the best talent in the world, no matter where they live. Our highly collaborative, autonomous, and effective working environment is fueled by a team unified by a love of continuous learning. Our years of thought leadership including books, whitepapers, blog posts, conference and MeetUp talks, demonstrate our commitment to sharing what we've learned.
We encourage every Modus employee to do the same. Our company is a platform for the growth of our employees. Through working with our distributed team of experts on challenging projects, every person that joins the Modus team can expect to continue growing and learning every day. This is your chance to be part of building something great.

jobs.title: Desenvolvedor(a) Angular
Front End Javascript Engineer
jobs.description:
Overview
Hey there, we are Rye Labs! We build fintech and business data platforms for Latin America. We are looking for an experienced frontend engineer to join our team to help us expand our white label business lending platform to new markets.

You will also have the opportunity to hop into new projects as they come up. If you find yourself drawn to startups, taking something from an idea to a product in a matter of months, then this is your kind of role. This means you aren’t just tinkering with a monolithic product, you are building new products from scratch with the ability to really guide the architecture.

Technology Stack
We try to keep things as simple as possible by using Javascript everywhere we can. On the backend, we use Node.js with Express.The exact Express stack for our finance platform includes TypeORM (w/ Postgres) and routing-controllers - if those are new to you, that’s ok, they are fun to learn!

On the frontend we utilize React and Redux (although we’re pretty excited about some of the new state management alternatives).

Responsibilities
• Take mockups/prototypes from design to code - you should be a design perfectionist
• Create modular React components that are as reusable as possible
• Design frontend component system to support multiple markets with differing needs
• Work closely with our designers to ensure great UX/UI
• Work within a small remote team to bring our lending platform to new markets and work on new projects as they arise.
• Write tests to ensure code stability and maintainability

Qualifications
• 1+ years of experience with React with strong knowledge of building reusable components
• Knowledge of modern HTML and CSS (flexbox, etc.)
• Experience with Redux or a similar global state management system
• Ability to take mockup or prototype to working code that looks as good or better than original design
• 3+ years of development experience
• Great english and communication skills (we love Slack and Hangouts)

Bonus points
• Eye for great design
• Knowledge and passion for amazing UX/UI
• Design experience/skills (Sketch, Illustrator, Invision, Figma, etc.)
• Knowledge of SEO best practices
• Experience with analytics platforms (Segment, Mixpanel/Heap, Fullstory, etc.)
• Experience building whitelabel solutions
• Experience working remotely and/or within a startup
• Experience working in the financial or B2B space (payments, lending, data, etc.)
• Strong/native Spanish to work with Latam-based partners and API’s

About the company
Rye Labs is an innovation lab focused on financial and business data solutions.

We are a small team with a startup mindset - backed by CIAL Dun & Bradstreet, Latin America’s largest business data provider.

We believe that well designed products are as important as the technology that backs them, so we put a large focus on creating human-friendly design, branding, and messaging. We are inspired by design-focused companies like Airbnb and aim to bring that level of innovation to the B2B space.

We call ourselves an “innovation lab”, but what does that mean? Essentially, we work on technology projects with the goal of turning these projects into self-sufficient companies. We aren’t a development shop, we’re a startup partner. Our focus is on building technology products, but we have a hand in branding, marketing, sales, analytics, and any other aspect that can help our products succeed in the market.

What does that mean for you? It means you won’t get bored. There will always be new projects and challenges for you to tackle.

Our primary product is a whitelabel B2B point of sale financing solution. Our solution is live in a market in Brazil under the brand Finove and we are actively working to bring it to our next markets in Latin America.

In addition, we have other projects that we are taking on that you will have a hand in developing in partnership with our clients.

A few of the upcoming projects include:

• Completely rebuilding a 15+ year old business directory to be optimized for SEO and user conversion
• Creating an intuitive and user friendly wizard form that helps users easily input data about their company. Think “Turbotax” for business data.

We are a remote team (Los Angeles, New York, and Croatia), so you should be someone who enjoys collaborating with teammates, even if they’re on the other side of the globe. You will have a lot of resources, both on the team and externally, but it will be your responsibility to proactively problem solve and move the development forward.

We aim to build a diverse and inclusive team of individuals from around the globe. We want to create an environment where we can learn from each other, build amazing products that bring about positive change, and empower each other to enjoy life outside of work.

We’d love for you to join us!

Benefits
• Rye Labs is a remote company, so you can work from wherever you are
• Competitive pay based on location
• Flexible working hours
• Local holidays
• Unlimited PTO (minimum 2 weeks)
• Opportunity to have a large impact at an early stage company
• Challenging projects that push you toward continued growth and new technologies

Artefact is a new generation of a data service provider, specialising in data consulting and data-driven digital marketing, dedicated to transforming data into business impact across the entire value chain of organisations. We are proud to say we're enjoying skyrocketing growth.

We have 1000 employees across 20 offices who are focused on accelerating digital transformation.
